document.full_text: mariska hargitay, who stars as detective olivia benson on "law & order: special victims unit," has sued to stop a talent agency from claiming a share of her earnings from the hit nbc television show.
document.title: law & order svu's hargitay sues talent agency
lines_and_colors: mariska hargitay, who stars as detective olivia benson on "law & order: special victims unit," has sued to stop a talent agency from claiming a share of her earnings from the hit nbc television show.
